CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 容器（尤指狭颈的）；玻璃瓶；塑料瓶；一瓶之量；（婴儿）奶瓶；奶瓶；酒瓶；气瓶；钢瓶；水瓶
装瓶；将（液体、气体）装入瓶中；瓶装；封存（水果、蔬菜等）以保存；抑制（情感、愤怒等）

word_group.brief_definition: 不敢做；(中途)放弃, 退缩
澳洲两种树干含水肿胀的树木之一

bilingual.source: There is some water in the bottle.
There is much water in the bottle.
There is not (isn't) any water in the bottle.
Walk nicely and don't break the bottle.
There isn't much lemonade in the bottle.
bilingual.target: 瓶子里没有很多柠檬水。

bilingual.source: What happened to Alice when she drank from the bottle?
bilingual.target: 爱丽丝喝了瓶子里的东西后发生了什么？

bilingual.source: She found a bottle with the words "DRINK ME" on it.
bilingual.target: 她发现了一个写着“喝我”的瓶子。

bilingual.source: At the beach, Sterling found a bottle half-buried in the sand.
bilingual.target: 在海滩上，斯特林发现了一个半埋在沙子里的瓶子。

bilingual.source: The bottle made a glug sound as he emptied it.
bilingual.target: 当他把瓶子倒空时，瓶子发出了咕噜声。

list.abstract: bottle（英 [ˈbɒtl]，美 [ˈbɑːtl]），英语单词，作名词为狭颈小口瓶；勇气；信心。作动词为把…装入瓶中；丧失勇气；泄气。短语搭配有a bottle of（一瓶...）。例句为“So he began to roll the bottle.（于是他开始滚动瓶子。）” bottle相关近义词有possess、contain等。

yingyinNormal.en: Everything special about you came out of a bottle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你所有的能力都来自一个小瓶子。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you like a clue? Yes, please. The first clue is in a bottle. But where is the bottle? I can see it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你需要一点提示吗？当然需要。第一个提示是在瓶子里。但是瓶子在哪呢？我看到瓶子啦。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa has found the first clue. A message in a bottle. Look, everyone. Here's the bottle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩琪找到了第一个线索，瓶子里的纸条。大家快看，这里有一个瓶子。

yingyinNormal.en: I understand. In seventh grade, I played Spin the Bottle and it landed on Alina Shankar.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我明白，七年级我玩"转瓶子"游戏时，瓶子指向了爱林娜·香卡。

yingyinNormal.en: The genie is out of that bottle. Clear and present is Ultron.
yingyinNormal.zh: 魔鬼已经逃出了瓶子，眼下的问题明显是奥创。

yingyinNormal.en: She said if I came near her, she would break the bottle and cut me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她说如果我敢靠近她，她就敲碎瓶子捅我。

yingyinNormal.en: She just took a bottle out of her purse and sprinkled it into mom's soup.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她刚刚从包里拿出一个瓶子往妈妈的汤里撒了点东西。

yingyinNormal.en: I got the stuff old look, and I got it really cheap because it's still on that old bottle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个东西看起来旧旧的，买的时候很便宜，因为放在旧旧的瓶子里。

yingyinNormal.en: Can we help, Mummy? Yes, you can. Let's throw this empty bottle in the bin. Peppa, stop. What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们能来帮忙吗？当然可以！把这个空瓶子丢进垃圾桶里。佩奇，等等！怎么了？

yingyinNormal.en: Can we help, Mummy? Yes, you can. Let's throw this empty bottle in the bin. Peppa, stop. What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们能来帮忙吗？当然可以！把这个空瓶子丢进垃圾桶里。佩奇，等等！怎么了？

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa, you have a bottle, so which box does it go in? The green one. Yes. This is fun. Now, it's George's turn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇，你有一个瓶子，要放在哪个箱子呢？绿色的！没错！这真好玩！现在换乔治了.

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa, you have a bottle, so which box does it go in? The green one. Yes. This is fun. Now, it's George's turn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇，你有一个瓶子，要放在哪个箱子呢？绿色的！没错！这真好玩！现在换乔治了.

yingyinNormal.en: Look at this. Mouthwash, lotion, body wash. Shampoo and conditioner together in one tiny bottle. I love Las Vegas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 快看，漱口水，润肤露，沐浴液，洗发水护发素全部在一个小瓶子里，我爱拉斯维加斯。

yingyinNormal.en: Give me the bottle. Get me the towel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把奶瓶给我，把毛巾给我。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm going add the whole bottle, I think.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把整瓶都倒进去。

yingyinNormal.en: Look. Kobe steaks. Bottle of scotch. Cigars.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你瞧，神户牛排[日本产]，一瓶威士忌[苏格兰产]，雪茄[古巴产]。

yingyinNormal.en: Bring a bottle of water on stage if you're allowed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果可以的话，带一瓶水上台。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: Who says you can't put the genie back in the bottle?
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁说精灵不能再装回瓶里呢？

yingyinNormal.en: And here is the bottle of wine for you to bring over tonight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是你今晚要带过来的酒。

yingyinNormal.en: What's this? Why, it's a bottle of champagne. Why is this here?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么? 是一瓶香槟! 它为什么在这？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Water <highlight>bottles</highlight>, and other trash litter the planet, because plastics are everywhere and don't break down easily.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 水瓶和其他垃圾遍布地球，因为塑料无处不在，而且不容易分解。

examination_example.sentence: The "empty <highlight>bottles</highlight>" metaphor illustrates that people feel a pressure to make passing time fulfilling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “空瓶子”的比喻说明，人们对让逝去的时间变得充实感到非常有压力。

examination_example.sentence: We feel a pressure to fill these different-sized <highlight>bottles</highlight> as they pass.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当这些不同大小的瓶子经过时，我们对要填满它们感到有一种压力。

word_usage.usage: bottle作名词，表示“酒”时，只用单数形式，且其前须加定冠词the
bottle作及物动词，其后可直接接名词或者代词，如：bottle the milk

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Though cocoa seed is not an ingredient of the soda, they designed their <highlight>bottle</highlight> based on the seed's shape and large middle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管可可种子不是苏打水的成分，但他们根据种子的形状和膨大的中间部分设计了瓶子的样式。

examination_example.sentence: What do we learn about the Coca-Cola <highlight>bottle</highlight> designed by the Root Glass Company?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于由根玻璃公司设计的可口可乐瓶，我们了解到什么？

examination_example.sentence: It was 100 years ago this week that the <highlight>bottle</highlight> earned a patent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 100年前的这个星期，瓶子获得了专利。

examination_example.sentence: Flash back to 1915, when a <highlight>bottle</highlight> of Coca-Cola cost just a nickel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让我们回到1915年，当时一瓶可口可乐只要5美分。

word_usage.usage: a bottle of表示“一瓶...”，后面通常接不可数名词，如：a bottle of water 一瓶水

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_usage.usage: a bottle of表示“一瓶...”，后面通常接不可数名词，如：a bottle of water 一瓶水

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: But it doesn't end with <highlight>bottles</highlight>, cans, and paper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但它不会以瓶子、罐子和纸结束。

examination_example.sentence: We had to have a bit of a production line going, making up "tiger milk", washing baby <highlight>bottles</highlight>, and cleaning the floors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不得不让生产线运转起来，比如制作“虎奶”、清洗幼崽奶瓶和清洁地板。

examination_example.sentence: Guided tour includes bike, helmet, cookies and <highlight>bottled</highlight> water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有导游的游览包括自行车，头盔，饼干和瓶装水。

examination_example.sentence: They got apples, a sandwich and a <highlight>bottle</highlight> of juice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们得到了苹果，一个三明治和一瓶果汁。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: And the gate in front of her house is made of rocks and old glass <highlight>bottles</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她家门前的大门是用石头和旧玻璃瓶做的。

examination_example.sentence: She put the <highlight>bottle</highlight> to her lips and drank.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她把瓶子放在嘴边喝了起来。

examination_example.sentence: The mouth of the <highlight>bottle</highlight> was small.
Local people like to order several best-known dishes and some <highlight>bottles</highlight> of beer and spend their evening time with friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当地人喜欢点几道最有名的菜和几瓶啤酒，晚上和朋友一起度过。

examination_example.sentence: They buy <highlight>bottles</highlight> of eye drops to keep their eyes wet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们买了几瓶眼药水来保持眼睛湿润。

examination_example.sentence: When someone donated <highlight>bottles</highlight> of water, Ewan and his family held a drive to get even more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当有人捐了几瓶装水时，尤恩和他的家人举行了一次募捐活动，希望得到更多的水。

word_usage.usage: a bottle of表示“一瓶...”，后面通常接不可数名词，如：a bottle of water 一瓶水
